mapper.select: INSERT INTO AIRPORTINFO( S_AIRPORT_NAME, S_DEPARTURE_TIME, S_ARRIVAL_TIME, S_DEPART_AIRPORT, S_ARRIVAL_AIRPORT, S_DEPART_DATE, S_ARRIVAL_DATE, S_AIRPORT_NAMER, S_DEPARTURE_TIMER, S_ARRIVAL_TIMER, S_DEPART_DATER, S_ARRIVAL_DATER, S_PRICER, S_ARRIVAL_AIRPORTR, S_DEPART_AIRPORTR) VALUES(#{sAirportName}, #{sDepartureTime}, #{sArrivalTime}, #{sDepartAirport}, #{sArrivalAirport}, #{sDepartDate}, #{sArrivalDate}, #{sAirportNamer}, #{sDepartureTimer}, #{sArrivalTimer}, #{sDepartDater}, #{sArrivalDater}, #{sPricer}, #{sArrivalAirportr}, #{sDepartAirportr} )
